author: NiharSaha
body:
#### PR description:
Drop type specs in Validation/Performance/python configurations files.
Following the Central DQM migration campaign for drop type spces following 
https://cms-sw.github.io/cms_coding_rules.html#6--packaging-rules-1

#### PR validation:
Tested in CMSSW_12_3_X via runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all ibeos

title: Drop type specs in Validation/Performance
